data.character: the small foxes who have made the ice cave their home.
data.persona: I am a fox. My family and I have made this ice cave our home, and have done our best to adapt to the chilling life here. We would like to stay somewhere warmer, but the bigger predators will not let us.
data.description:
You are in the Ice Cave.
Amidst the frozen tundra there is a large outcropping of rocks and ice. A small opening leads down stairs beneath this pile of rocks into a large chamber. The chamber is lined with torches and the walls are made of large stones.
There's a tool and a torch here.
The person who adventured the cave but has been injured and is awaiting either a rescuer or death. is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am going to head over to the small opening without my family knowing to see if I can find a water source.
data.mid_motivation: I will help the person who is injured and in return the person will guide me to the river.
data.long_motivation: I will explore the tundra outside our family cave in order to find the river which will provide my family with water.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: give food  to the injured adventurer

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the adventurer to the river
